arts.ttl: Lazio’s Nicolo Rovella after Coppa Italia loss to Inter: “We played better than Inter”
arts.sum: Serie A side Lazio got knocked out of the Coppa Italia at the hands of Inter yesterday, as the Nerazzurri picked up a 2-0 victory to cement their place…

arts.ttl: Lazio: Eyes on UEFA Europa League Glory
arts.sum: After the disappointment of last season, few Lazio fans went into this campaign confident that it would be one to remember. Yet, in a testament to the unpredictability of football, that’s just what it might turn out to be. arts.ttl: Former Premier League forward scores sensational volley for Inter Milan in Coppa Italia quarter-final win over Lazio as they hunt domestic double
arts.sum: Inter Milan are currently top of the league table, one point ahead of Antonio Conte 's Napoli after winning at the weekend and the former Chelsea and Tottenham coach's side lost.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim stance on Mason Mount made clear as Fabrizio Romano opens up on Inter rumours
arts.sum: Fabrizio Romano has dismissed the claims that Manchester United will let Mason Mount leave and the midfielder is liked by Inter. arts.ttl: Toothless Lazio Knocked Out of Coppa Italia by Inter Milan Wonder Goal
arts.sum: Inter Milan prevailed over Lazio in front of their home supporters at San Siro in the most anticipated fixture of the Coppa Italia quarter-finals. arts.ttl: Arnautovic magic helps Inter past Lazio in Coppa
arts.sum: Inter Milan secured a commanding 2-0 victory at home against Lazio on Tuesday, with Marko Arnautovic producing a dazzling strike that sent them soaring into the Coppa Italia semi-finals.
